title: Sora 2 vs Gemini 3 Pro: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Sora 2 vs Gemini 3 Pro. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Sora 2 and Gemini 3 Pro? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Sora 2 vs Gemini 3 Pro
paragraphs: Sora 2 (generative ai) is Sora 2 is OpenAI's latest text-to-video generation model that creates high-quality, realistic videos up to 20 seconds long from text prompts or images. Released in September 2025, it features synchronized dialogue, ambient sound effects, and background music generated natively alongside video. Its key differentiator is the ability to generate cinematic, physically accurate videos with native audio in multiple styles including realistic, anime, and stylized formats.. It's known for video-generation, text-to-video, ai-video.

Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2025 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. Users choose it for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Sora 2: Text-to-video generation up to 20 seconds, Image-to-video with motion control, Native audio generation (dialogue, sound effects, music)
Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

verdict: Both Sora 2 and Gemini 3 Pro are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Sora 2 for video-generation, Gemini 3 Pro for llm.
